thread.title: IAF Day celebrations Live Streaming: 83rd Anniversary of the Indian Air Force
thread.title_full: IAF Day celebrations Live Streaming: 83rd Anniversary of the Indian Air Force

author: Shweta Parande
title: IAF Day celebrations Live Streaming: 83rd Anniversary of the Indian Air Force
text:
IAF Day celebrations Live Streaming: 83rd Anniversary of the Indian Air Force By Shweta Parande on October 8, 2015 at 10:17 AM Comments 
The Indian Air Force (IAF) is celebrating the 83rd Air Force Day on October 8, 2015. Celebrations took off in the morning with a parade, and aerobatics and other aerial stunts will be part of the display. The event is taking place at the Hindon air base near Delhi. Here is the live streaming video of the IAF Day event, courtesy of Doordarshan. 
The Air Force has just announced that they plan to induct females as fighter pilots, which is a great development and a long-term wish of the women of this country. 
At the live IAF event, the Surya Kiran Aerobatic Team (SKAT) makes a comeback and will showcased its act. Also, sky divers of the Akash Ganga aerobatic squadron will be a prominent feature of the event. 
Prime Minister Narendra Modi shared a special message of the IAF and pictures on the occasion, on Twitter. He said, “I salute our air force personnel on Air Force Day. They have always served India with great courage & determination.” He added, “Contribution of our Air Force is monumental. They are always at the forefront, be it in protecting skies or in times of disasters.” I salute our air force personnel on Air Force Day. They have always served India with great courage & determination. pic.twitter.com/S0Wr3nySYa 
— Narendra Modi (@narendramodi) October 8, 2015 

Watch the live streaming of the IAF Day 83rd anniversary celebrations here. (Photo and video courtesy: DD)
